name: Area accessible and ready (If failed please take a photo)
Surface has been checked and confirmed acceptable
Floors are scraped, vaccum and puddle flanges exposed
Has a bucket test been completed by others to ensure compliance falls to waste
Ensure moisture content of slab is under 4.5%(Ensure photo is taken)
Primer (Ensure photo is taken) - SILCOR Primer BS
Ensure angles are installed as per metre mark
Detailed areas such as pipe penetrations, pits, joints, pile capping installed as per specification
Tie / Broadcast coat applied (Ensure photo is taken) - Silcor 575 - Sand will be applied with Tie coat
Correct curing time allowed 12hr (Tie / Broadcast coat)
Application to correct DFT (Ensure photo is taken) - DFT required for walls (1 mm) and floor (1.5mm)
Flood Test 24 hours (Ensure photo is taken)
